Mr. Graydon Ausmus
WUOA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
February 25th, 1952
Dear Graydon:
I have your note of February 19th and I certainly
would appreciate it if you would plan the entire agenda for
the Columbus meeting. The basic purpose should be to bring
the entire Board up-to-date on the actions of the Executive
Committee, the Adult Education Committee, the Program Acceptance
Committee and the In-School Program Committee. Perhaps after
the Oklahoma meeting I will have more detailed ideas for an
agenda.
I don't believe that the Columbus meeting will be
as rough a session as you indicate. I think it is more
important for you to consider the luncheon which will really
be the major contribution of the organization to the Institute.
